meanings.definition: The state or quality of being squeaky.
meanings.sent1: The squeakinesses of the old door made it easy to locate in the dark.
meanings.sent2: I couldn't stand the squeakinesses of the chalk on the blackboard.
meanings.sent3: The toy mouse had such exaggerated squeakinesses that it made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The squeakinesses of the rusty swing set echoed through the empty playground.
meanings.sent5: The high-pitched squeakinesses of the mouse made it seem even smaller.

meanings.definition: The sound or act of squeaking.
meanings.sent1: The mouse's squeakinesses alerted us to its presence in the room.
meanings.sent2: The floorboards announced our arrival with their loud squeakinesses.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected squeakinesses of the rubber duck startled the cat.
meanings.sent4: The squeakinesses of the violin strings filled the concert hall with music.
meanings.sent5: The old car's door made familiar squeakinesses as it opened.
